trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that supports <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that supports <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"></xref> class with the specified type for which the template is intended.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"> </xref> classe com o tipo especificado para o qual destina-se o modelo.

trans-unit.source: The `dataType` parameter is either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object or a string representing an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: O `dataType` parâmetro encontra-se um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] objeto ou uma cadeia que representa um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding Sources Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de origens de enlace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The type for which this template is intended.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para o qual se destina este modelo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers for the child items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de itens alternados contentores para os itens subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedades permitem-lhe especificar o aspecto de dois ou mais contentores item alternadas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode especificar cores de fundo alternadas para cada item terceiro no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is assigned to each item container in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>É atribuído a cada contentor do item no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> begins at 0, increments until it is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> minus 1, and then restarts at 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>começa com 0, incrementa até que esteja <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>menos 1 e, em seguida, reinicia em 0.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> is 3 and there are seven items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the following table lists the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each item.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>é 3 e não existirem sete itens o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, a tabela seguinte lista o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para cada item.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Position of Item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |1|0| |2|1| |3|2| |4|0| |5|1| |6|2| |7|0| When you set the AlternationCount property, you are indicating that the child items should get an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in that range, not the item that has this <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: | Posição do Item no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |&1; |&0; | |&2; |&1; | |&3; |&2; | |&4; |&0; | |&5; |&1; | |&6; |&2; | |&7; |&0; | Quando definir a propriedade AlternationCount, é com a indicação de que os itens do subordinado devem obter um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>nesse intervalo, não o item que tem este <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>aplicadas ao mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> called `aHeaderedItemsControl` uses a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> with the AlternationCount set, the item containers of the child items of `aHeaderedItemsControl` will have an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, not the item container for `aHeaderedItemsControl`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>chamado `aHeaderedItemsControl` utiliza um <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>com o conjunto de AlternationCount, os contentores do item dos itens subordinados de `aHeaderedItemsControl` terá um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, não o contentor de item de `aHeaderedItemsControl`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: Existem vários métodos que pode utilizar para especificar appearances diferentes para os contentores de item alternadas.

trans-unit.source: One method is to bind properties of the items container to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: É um método vincular as propriedades do contentor de itens para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>para especificar qual o valor deve ser aplicado ao contentor do item que tem uma determinada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar acionadores para alterar o valor da propriedade de um contentor de item dependendo do valor do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The number of alternating item containers for the next level of items.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens alternados contentores para o próximo nível de itens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> that is copied to each child item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> que é copiado para cada item subordinado.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> property, each item container gets a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> that has the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>, but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>, are specific to the data for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>propriedade, o contentor de cada item obtém um <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>que tenha o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>objetos como o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>, mas as propriedades que descrevem os dados nos vínculos, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>, são específicas para os dados para cada item na <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must access the item container's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.
trans-unit.target: Tem de aceder a do item contentor <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>para efetuar operações, como validar os dados e a verificação de erros no item.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> that is copied to each child item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> que é copiado para cada item subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the item container for each child item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> que é aplicada ao contentor do item para cada item subordinado.

trans-unit.source: You use this property or the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade ou o <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>propriedade para definir um estilo para afetar o aspeto dos elementos que contêm os itens de dados.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, são os contentores gerados <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>controla; para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, são <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the item container for each child item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> que é aplicada ao contentor do item para cada item subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets custom style-selection logic for a style that can be applied to each item container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lógica de seleção de estilo personalizado para um estilo que pode ser aplicado a cada contentor de item.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>propriedade para definir um estilo para afetar o aspeto dos elementos que contêm os itens de dados.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, são os contentores gerados <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>controla; para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, são <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one style defined and need to supply logic to choose which one to apply, then you use the ItemContainerStyleSelector property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver mais do que um estilo definido e ter de fornecer a lógica para escolher qual deles aplicam-se, em seguida, utilize a propriedade ItemContainerStyleSelector em vez do <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que esta propriedade é ignorada se o <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"></xref> that chooses which style to use as the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"> </xref> que escolhe que estilo para utilizar como <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle*>.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding for this data template, which indicates where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o vínculo para este modelo de dados, que indica onde encontrar a coleção que representa o próximo nível na hierarquia de dados.

trans-unit.source: This is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property on a generated <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>) to indicate where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Isto é aplicado ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>propriedade um gerado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>(tal como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>) para indicar onde encontrar a coleção que representa o próximo nível na hierarquia de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the type.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte o tipo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the items in the next level in the data hierarchy if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar os itens no próximo nível na hierarquia de dados se são apresentadas como cadeias.

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the items in the next level of the data hierarchy if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar os itens no próximo nível da hierarquia de dados se são apresentadas como cadeias.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> para aplicar ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>propriedade um gerado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (tal como um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> ou um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), para indicar como apresentar itens do que o próximo nível na hierarquia de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> para aplicar ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>propriedade um gerado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (tal como um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> ou um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), para indicar como apresentar itens do que o próximo nível na hierarquia de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to select a template to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> para aplicar ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>propriedade um gerado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (tal como um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> ou um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), para indicar como selecionar um modelo para apresentar os itens do que o próximo nível na hierarquia de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to select a template to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objecto a aplicar ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>propriedade um gerado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (tal como um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> ou um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), para indicar como selecionar um modelo para apresentar os itens do que o próximo nível na hierarquia de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>
